nodes.description: 0940（0740 GMT）红海度假村Lehamim面包店发生爆炸，店主及两名员工死亡
nodes.support_text: explosion hit the Lehamim bakery in a residential area at 0940 (0740 GMT), killing the owner and two employees.

nodes.description: 三个巴勒斯坦组织（伊斯兰抵抗运动、阿克萨烈士旅、伊斯兰旅）宣称对爆炸负责
nodes.support_text: Three Palestinian militant groups said they were behind the attack

nodes.description: 袭击者据称从加沙经约旦进入以色列实施爆炸
nodes.support_text: Militants said the bomber entered Israel via Jordan

nodes.description: 目击者描述袭击者穿着黑色外套携带背包进入高温的Eilat地区
nodes.support_text: I saw a man with a black coat and a bag. For Eilat, where it is hot, it is strange to see someone walking with a coat.

nodes.description: 袭击者背包内携带爆炸物引发大规模爆炸，建筑剧烈震动
nodes.support_text: Police said the bomber had entered the shop carrying the explosives in a backpack.

nodes.description: 三个组织声称七个月前策划袭击并警告后续行动
nodes.support_text: The groups said the attack was planned seven months ago and warned of more to come.

nodes.description: 以色列总理奥姆ert宣布持续打击巴勒斯坦武装分子
nodes.support_text: Olmert vowed to continue fighting Palestinian militants.

nodes.description: 法塔赫发言人阿布·拉布谴责袭击损害巴勒斯坦形象
nodes.support_text: Yasser Abed Rabbo condemned the attack.

nodes.description: 哈马斯称爆炸是针对以色列在约旦河西岸行动的'自然反应'
nodes.support_text: Hamas described the bombing as a 'natural reaction'.

nodes.description: 联合国中东特使德索托谴责袭击针对平民且无正当理由
nodes.support_text: De Soto said it was an attack on ordinary people.

nodes.description: 文本提及2006年特拉维夫餐厅自杀袭击造成10名以色列人死亡
nodes.support_text: The last suicide attack killed 10 Israelis at a Tel Aviv restaurant.

nodes.description: 警方对炸弹袭击者进入商店的声明
nodes.support_text: 警方表示炸弹袭击者进入商店

edges.support_text: Three Palestinian militant groups said they were behind the attack
Olmert vowed to continue fighting Palestinian militants.
Yasser Abed Rabbo condemned the attack.
Hamas described the bombing as a 'natural reaction'.
De Soto said it was an attack on ordinary people.
Militants said the bomber entered Israel via Jordan
I saw a man with a black coat and a bag... Seconds later, I heard a huge blast.
Police said the bomber had entered the shop carrying the explosives in a backpack.
The groups said the attack was planned seven months ago and warned of more to come.
The last suicide attack killed 10 Israelis at a Tel Aviv restaurant.
警方声明与炸弹进入商店事件存在因果关系
